sentences.en: an address to the European Parliament
sentences.cn: 致欧洲议会的演讲

sentences.en: Applications should be addressed to: The business affairs editor.
sentences.cn: 申请信应该寄给商务编辑。

sentences.en: David had changed his lodgings, leaving no address behind.
sentences.cn: 戴维换了一间租屋，没留下地址。

sentences.en: Do you have an address and phone number for him?
sentences.cn: 你有他的地址和电话号码么？

sentences.en: Feminism must address issues beyond the concerns of middle-class whites.
sentences.cn: 女权主义解决的问题不能仅仅局限于中产阶级白人妇女所关心的问题。

sentences.en: For a copy of their brochure, write to the above address.
sentences.cn: 欲索取其宣传册，请写信至以上地址。

sentences.en: Have you moved yet? Pls advise address, phone no.
sentences.cn: 你已经搬了吗？请告知地址和电话号码。

sentences.en: He took my name and address, scribbling it down in his notebook.
sentences.cn: 他要了我的姓名和地址，匆匆写在他的笔记本上。

sentences.en: I can give you the address of a good attorney.
sentences.cn: 我可以给你一个好律师的地址。

sentences.en: I looked your address up in the personnel file.
sentences.cn: 我在人事档案里找到了你的地址。

sentences.en: It is counter-productive to address an interviewee in patronizing tones.
sentences.cn: 以盛气凌人的语气同面试者讲话将会适得其反。

sentences.en: Our products address the needs of real users.
sentences.cn: 我们的产品满足真正用户的需要。

sentences.en: Send a stamped, self-addressed envelope (=  with your address on it so it can be sent back to you  ) .
sentences.cn: 寄上一个贴好邮票的、写有回邮地址的信封。

sentences.en: Send your details on a card to the following address.
sentences.cn: 在明信片上写明你的近况寄到下面的地址。

sentences.en: Someone cranked up the volume of the public address system.
sentences.cn: 有人调大了公共广播系统的音量。

sentences.en: Specific groups may be formed to address specific issues.
sentences.cn: 可能会组成特别小组去解决特定问题。

sentences.en: The address is 2025 M Street, Northwest, Washington, DC, 20036.
sentences.cn: 地址为华盛顿特区，西北区，M大街2025号，邮政编码20036。

sentences.en: The address is 2025 M Street, NW, Washington, DC, 20036.
sentences.cn: 地址是华盛顿哥伦比亚特区，华盛顿西北，M街2025号，邮编20036。

sentences.en: The old official club website address has been taken over by cybersquatters.
sentences.cn: 俱乐部原来的官方网址已经被人抢注了。

sentences.en: They heckled him and interrupted his address with angry questions.
sentences.cn: 他们冲他起哄，以激愤的问题打断他的发言。

sentences.en: We were allotted half an hour to address the committee.
sentences.cn: 给了我们半个小时向委员会作陈述。

sentences.en: What’s your new address?
sentences.cn: 你的新地址是什么？

words.tran_cn: 收件人，收信人；[计] 被访地址
邮件地址印刷机；印名片机

phrases.tran_cn: 家庭住址；标识地址；内部地址
永久地址；永久住址；原籍
扩声系统；有线广播系统；公用地址系统

trans.tran_en: a formal speech that someone makes to a group of people

trans.tran_cn: 写（收信人）姓名地址，解决，处理，演讲，向…说话，称呼
trans.tran_en: if you address an envelope, package etc, you write on it the name and address of the person you are sending it to

trans.tran_cn: 向…讲话； 写姓名地址； 称呼； 处理
trans.tran_en: if you address an envelope, package etc, you write on it the name and address of the person you are sending it to
